page.title: 11 EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {Employment}issues in Ellesmere Port regularly make the headlines in local news.{Factories}opening and closing and workers being taken on or made {redundant.}The larger part of the Port's industry grew up Pre-War with the arrival of{oil}and its associated industries. This still forms part of a large{canal-side indstrial complex including Shell, ICI, UKF, OCTEL, and other{chemical plants.}The arrival of {Vauxhall assembly plant}into the area attracted other industries from the Midlands.{Paper manufacturing}played a major role as an employer until recently. Another industry providing employment is{British Nuclear Fuels}at Capenhurst (a source of controversy). The densely populated areas demand well-stocked, numerous retail outlets, and they provide a good percentage of the employment in the area.
